item.title: Delta CEO says Trump administration's approach to regulation could be 'breath of fresh air'
item.description: Delta CEO Ed Bastian said the Trump administration could address governmental "overreach" in regulation.

item.title: Snowflake shares rocket 30% and head for best day ever after earnings beat
item.description: Snowflake reported better-than-expected results on the top and bottom lines.

item.title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene tapped to work with Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy as new DOGE subcommittee chair
item.description: Greene's group will share the DOGE acronym with the entity commissioned by President-elect Donald Trump and led by billionaires Musk and Ramaswamy.

item.title: Home sales surged in October, just before mortgage rates jumped
item.description: Sales were 2.9% higher than October of last year, marking the first annual increase in over three years.

item.title: Britainâ€™s 'mini-budget' disaster should serve as a warning to the U.S., bond strategists say
item.description: Fears are mounting that the U.S. could soon experience its own version of Britain's "mini-budget" crisis.
